banner.header:
Where the heart is,
Hope is there.
banner.description:
3DDonate.com,
Ergotherapist İsmail İşler and Emre Akıncı PhD. was organized by 3D printers to produce adaptive products for disadvantaged individuals completely free of charge.

section-how-help.desc: You can give information about this formation to individuals in need around you. You can be a local supporter of this project in your region. If you have a 3D printer, you can support by printing for the demands in your city.
